definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.chinese: 她拿他的八字鬍開玩笑。

sentences.english: He was heavily-built and sported a red moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他身材魁梧，留着紅色的八字鬍。

sentences.english: This fake moustache ring will be useful in all kinds of situations.
sentences.chinese: 這款八字鬍形狀的戒指在各種場合下都會非常有用哦。
